keyPolicies.policyDescription: Broxtowe's vote to leave has been ignored by our previous MP. Only the Conservatives can Get Brexit Done - so we can invest in our NHS, schools and police.
Let's make the most of Broxtowe's green corridors for cycle routes. Encouraging cleaner and greener communities and options for commuters.
Our NHS is vitally important to all of us. We need more front-line investment, so our local hospitals are fit for purpose.
Securing our fair share from the Government’s Towns Fund initiative - to regenerate Stapleford Town Centre and boost local businesses in Broxtowe.
Our children and grandchildren deserve the best education possible – including better access to alternative training like apprenticeships.
Securing Broxtowe’s fair share of the 20,000 extra police officers we’ll recruit. We need more police on the beat to keep our streets safe.
